summary: Presented in a surreal, gory and entirely visual manner, Begotten tells of the death of religion, the abuse of nature by Man and a nihilistic outlook on what life ultimately is.
cast: Brian Salzberg|Donna Dempsey|Stephen Charles Barry|James Gandia|Daniel Harkins|Michael Phillips|Erik Slavin|Arthur Streeter|Adolfo Vargas|Garfield White
director: Director: E. Elias Merhige (as Edmund E. Merhige)
title: Begotten
